Posts.Content: Hi Thanks for your reply , I have gone to my GP and it is a definite infection, but I was wondering about what was the cause . It seems to happen a few weeks after a mammogram. It didnt happen the first year after my op . I did not have a mammogram that year. Mary
Posts.Title: Has anyone had the same experience?

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectemy followed by radio therapy three years ago also prescribed tamoxifen. I had my first mammogram since my op last year. About a month later my breast became very red and inflamed I also had a fever Gp gave me penicillin and it cleared up. Well about a month ago I had another mammogram and the same thing has happened again I am still taking penicellin at the moment and again the fever has gone down. Is it just a coincedence that it happens a few weeks after my mammogram.
Posts.Title: Has anyone had the same experience?
